articles.title: Helicopter catches space rocket booster - The Mercury
articles.description:
The American-New Zealand company Rocket Lab has taken a big step forward in its quest to reuse its launch vehicles – by catching one – as it fell back to Earth.

A helicopter grabbed the booster mid-air as it parachuted back towards the Pacific Ocean.

articles.title: American woman living in Ireland goes viral saying she would 'not recommend' country - Irish Mirror
articles.description: "I moved to Ireland for work in the middle of the pandemic, and though my employer determined the location, I was cautiously optimistic. I associated Ireland with leprechauns, cute sayings, and stunning nature."
articles.content:

articles.title: Chelsea Soccer Club Sold To U.S.-Led Investors, Ending Ownership By Russian Oligarch Abramovich - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
